original_title: Zombi Apocalipsis Sensuale 2: Zombis Nazis en la Yungla
overview: The lost sequel to the mythical Zombie Apicalipsis Sensuale.  The horror, the fright, the zombies, the yungla, all in a J.Rollin jewel starring Victor "Dynamite" Melman and cast.
title: Zombi Apocalipsis Sensuale 2: Zombis Nazis en la Yungla
